tool_description: A REST api for public radio (NPR) member station info. It features filtering, geolocation searching, pagination, and sorting.
name: Open Broadcasting
title: Open Broadcasting

api_list.name: Stations
api_list.description: Fetch a collection of NPR member station records

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Filters the list of stations using key-value pairs of station attributes (JSON)

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorts the list of stations by a given station attribute value

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number to show stations from (page size is 30 items)
